ygData.subject: Re: one more thing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... AG! The only day I couldn t get to check the www because I was in the plane, coming back from california to france, and I miss the best shot! -- Vincent
ygData.messageBody:
According to Neil Lambert:
> if any of you happened to save the screenshot of EQSS's June 15th update, i'd really like to have it. it's a picture of some really cool wizard opening the gate to the plane of hate. it looks like a huge brick wall with a mouth in the middle and a red eye on the top. the mouth has a bluish portal in the middle and it looks damned cool... if anyone has it email me personally

AG! The only day I couldn't get to check the www because I was in the plane, coming
back from california to france, and I miss the best shot!

--
Vincent ARCHER -=-=- Herve Schauer Consultants -=-=- archer@...
